Dual Link Iris
A dual Link Iris system makes it possible to choose silent or click aperture adjustment. Aperture settings can be changed in an instant



Circular Aperture
The construction of the aperture blades with 9 elements makes it possible that the diaphragm shows a circle at all f-stops, creating a more natural impression.

Aluminium Alloy Body
All internal parts are protected by a solid and rigid aluminium housing.The body feels reassuringly well made with good balance and weightiness in the hand and when attached to a camera body.



Floating Mechanism System
The floating mechanism system is effective in preventing malfunction and increasing the life of the lens. High optical performance was achieved in all photographic subject distances.

Made in JAPAN
From design to inspection, these Kowa lenses benefit from our concept “Made in Japan”. At the forefront of technology, the lenses where designed and developed drawing on over 60 years of Kowa optical heritage.

Standard Package
Master Lens, Lens Hood, Objective Cap, Mount Lens Cover, Soft Case.

description:
FA-Series: Telecentric

Kowa has added a new 4/3 inch telecentric macro zoom to its product line. The LM1119TC is telecentric from 0.5× – 1.0× magnification and able to resolve up to 21 megapixel.

Besides that, Kowa introduces a new 2/3 inch telecentric 5 megapixel plus series. The series includes three lenses with adjustable magnification. The ranges of magnification are 1.725× – 2.2× (LM1121TC), 1.15× – 1.47× (LM1122TC) and 0.69× – 0.88× (LM1123TC).

All new telecentric lenses have very low distortion. They produce high contrast and resolution in both center and corners.
In a telecentric optical system, there is no change in magnification when focusing, and magnification is constant over working distances. Thus movement of an object does not change magnification. Therefore, it is suitable for measuring objects with high accuracy.
